listener
Class ListenerImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      listener.Listener
          listener.ListenerImpl

public class ListenerImpl
extends Listener

This class represents an object capable of listening to filesystem events on pre-specified folders and notify about changes to files.

Author:
Or Shwartz, Itay Evron

Nested Class Summary
Modifier and Type Class and Description
 class ListenerImpl.ListenerThread
          This class is a thread for processing file events for watched directories.

isActive

public boolean isActive()
Specified by:
isActive in class Listener
Returns:
True if the listener is active. False is returned otherwise.
See Also:

listenTo

public void listenTo(ListenedDirectory dir)
              throws java.io.IOException
Listens to file changes in given directory, using files matching any of the supplied regular expressions. If the given directory is already being listen to, the regular expression file filters are simply updated to the new given filters.

Specified by:
listenTo in class Listener
Parameters:
dir - Directory for file-change-monitoring.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs when attempting to register a directory for listening.
See Also:
Listener.listenTo(listener.ListenedDirectory)

stopListeningTo

public void stopListeningTo(java.io.File pathToMute)
Specified by:
stopListeningTo in class Listener
Parameters:
pathToMute - Directory to remove from listener.
See Also:
Listener.stopListeningTo(File)

checkRegex

public boolean checkRegex(java.nio.file.Path fileName,
                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> regularExpressions)
This method checks whether a filename matches any of the given regular expressions.

Specified by:
checkRegex in class Listener
Parameters:
fileName - which should be matched.
regularExpressions - to check against.
Returns:
True is returned if the filename matches at least one of the regular expressions. False, if it matches none of the regular expressions.

                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

close

public void close()
Use this method when done using the listener. Do not restart the listener afterwards.

Specified by:
close in class Listener

getListenedPaths

public java.util.Map<java.io.File,ListenedDirectory> getListenedPaths()
Gets a copy of the listened directories and the regular expression filters for the files in these directories. This is a "heavy" operation and its use should be minimized. The returned construct is optimized for read-only use.

Specified by:
getListenedPaths in class Listener
Returns:
the listenedPaths
